_description: Index of archived decisions - Quick reference to historical decisions
_purpose: Allow AI to quickly find relevant past decisions without loading full archives

archives.2025-10: 质量门禁简化、定位明确为个人工具、文档清理、自愈系统创建 (详见 memory-archive/2025-10.json)
archives.2025-08: 尝试添加性能分析工具, 临时修复日志问题

_usage.for_ai: When you need context about old decisions, check this index first. If you need full details, load the specific archive file.
_usage.for_humans: Quick overview of what happened each month. Full details are in the archive files.
